head to ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"http://www.icompetenatural.com/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"www.icompetenatural.com","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" and click the member's portal icon in the top right.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":" Upgrade to premium membership.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Read the Event information PDF about the contest.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Click ‘Enter new event’, select the domestic or international show you wish to enter and enter categories/sub categories you wish to participate in.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"By joining online you will receive your membership number instantly to enter a contest. To join online you need a Visa/Mastercard debit or credit card. We use PayPal to process the cards so you can also join with a PayPal account.
If you get an error message close the internet (your web browser) and reopen it again. That will fix most issues people encounter with their computer’s ‘cache’ (saved pages that no longer exist).","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Included in your membership:","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1. As an ICN Member you will be accepted to compete in dozens of ICN contests anywhere in Australia. ICN is the only bodybuilding organisation to host events in every State and Territory of Australia. It is a significant development for the sport to finally offer the same opportunities for every natural competitor to participate in one organisation Australia-wide. As an ICN Member and Competitor your results at the Australian Titles will bestow to you a genuine Australian ranking like other established Australian sports.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
2. As an ICN Member you will be accepted to compete in any International event which includes the Universe, WORLD Natural Games and International events in the world’s top destinations.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
3. ICN Members have the security and protection of a WADA Doping Policy. This means all Members are subject to both contest day drug-testing and off-season testing or investigation.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
4. A Professional Organisation and dedicated Head Office to administer and advance your sport.
5. ICN Portal, APPS, Website and Facebook pages updated daily.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
6. iCompete Members Dashboard offering competitors a host of convenient features and control over their event.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
7. A copy of The Competitors Encyclopedia (valued at $110.00)","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
